allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 -e "SHOW DATABASES LIKE ''fortune_db'';")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "SHOW TABLES;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as tarot_count FROM tarot_cards; SELECT COUNT(*) as saju_count FROM saju_results; SELECT COUNT(*) as omikuji_count FROM omikuji_results;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as zodiac_count FROM zodiac_compatibility; SELECT COUNT(*) as star_count FROM star_sign_compatibility;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "ALTER TABLE fortune_history MODIFY fortune_type ENUM(''daily'', ''tarot'', ''saju'', ''omikuji'', ''compatibility'') NOT NULL;")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "ALTER TABLE fortune_history MODIFY user_birthdate VARCHAR(200);")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "DESCRIBE fortune_history;")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "SHOW CREATE TABLE zodiac_compatibility;")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "SHOW CREATE TABLE fortune_history;")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p0000 fortune_db -e "ALTER TABLE fortune_history ADD COLUMN user_phone VARCHAR(20) AFTER user_gender;")
